rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports actions taken using neutral language.
The segment reports on actions taken by flock owners.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports factual actions/impacts (backyard owners keeping chickens in).
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes implemented safeguards ('keeping their chickens in and trying to keep wild waterfowl out... to protect their birds') without active reassurance.
